LanguageData.AquacultureHopper.label: Tolva de acuicultura
LanguageData.AquacultureHopper.description: Contiene alimentos para alimentar a las especies criadas en las cuencas de acuicultura. Esta tolva es refrigerada y los alimentos dentro no se echan a perder si se alimenta.
LanguageData.AquacultureHopper_Blueprint.label: Aquaculture hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.AquacultureHopper_Frame.label: Aquaculture hopper (building)
LanguageData.AquacultureHopper_Frame.description: Holds food to feed bred species in aquaculture basins. This hopper is refrigerated and food within will not spoil if powered.
